_description: Bookplate for a woman’s book — one cross-rhymed quatrain

HunHM136.Transcription:
Thys my mystrys bokeWho ovteyth hym forto haveWho so whovlde A
                    genstey lokeye ys a vere knave
HunHM136.Note:
Added to top margin in text of the Brut, by a sixteenth-century
                    hand.
HunHM136.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 253.
